meta.name: The Masked Singer
meta.description: Based on an international hit, which already is a viral phenomenon with more than half a billion fans worldwide, and the No. 1 top-trending video of 2017 on YouTube, The Masked Singer features celebrities facing off against one another with one major twist: each singer is shrouded from head to toe in an elaborate costume, complete with full face mask to conceal his or her identity. Ken Jeong, Jenny McCarthy, Nicole Scherzinger and Robin Thicke serve on the panel and play detective, alongside host Nick Cannon.

videos.title: Season Premiere: Mask On Face Off
videos.overview: The first six undercover celebrity singers -- peacock, hippo, monster, unicorn, deer and lion -- face off against one another in elaborate head-to-toe costumes.

videos.title: New Masks on the Block
videos.overview: The second six undercover celebrity singers -- rabbit, alien, raven, pineapple, poodle and bee -- face off against one another while wearing elaborate head-to-toe costumes.

videos.title: Five Masks No More
videos.overview: Peacock, monster, unicorn, deer and lion take the stage for their second performances; Joel McHale joins as a guest panelist.

videos.title: Another Mask Bites the Dust
videos.overview: Rabbit, alien, raven, poodle and bee each take the stage to perform a second time; Joel McHale joins as a guest panelist.

videos.title: Mix and Masks
videos.overview: The first group of celebrity singers return to the stage to perform individually and as a group to keep themselves in the competition.

videos.title: Touchy Feely Clues
videos.overview: Keeping themselves masked, the remaining celebrity singers hit the stage to perform.

videos.title: All Together Now
videos.overview: The remaining six celebrity singers merge into one big group as they perform anonymously; J.B. Smoove guest judges.

videos.title: Semi Finals: Double Unmasking
videos.overview: Two celebrities are unmasked, leaving only the top three singers; Kenan Thompson guest judges.

videos.title: Road to the Finals
videos.overview: The three remaining finalists compete for the golden mask, and their identities are revealed; guest panelist Kenan Thompson.

videos.title: Season Finale: The Final Mask is Lifted
videos.overview: The three remaining finalists compete for the golden mask, and their identities are revealed; guest panelist Kenan Thompson.

videos.title: Return of the Masks: Groups A & B
videos.overview: The first eight undercover celebrity singers face off against one another in head-to-toe costumes.

videos.title: Return of the Masks: Group C
videos.overview: Four new celebrity singers face off against one another.

videos.title: Return of the Masks: Group D
videos.overview: Four new celebrity singers face off against one another.

videos.title: Once Upon a Mask
videos.overview: Six celebrities take the stage for their second performance.

videos.title: Mask Us Anything
videos.overview: Six celebrities take the stage for their next performances of the season and one will be unmasked.

videos.title: Mask-ish
videos.overview: Actor, comedian, writer and game show host Anthony Anderson joins Nick Cannon and the panelists.

videos.title: Triumph Over Masks
videos.overview: Five celebrities perform; Triumph the Insult Comic Dog guest judges.

videos.title: Mask and You Shall Receive
videos.overview: Four of the remaining eight celebrities perform; the panelists attempt to guess their identities.

videos.title: Clash of the Masks
videos.overview: Four more of the remaining celebrities take on their next round of dazzling performances.

videos.title: A Pain in the Mask
videos.overview: The six remaining contestants compete together for the first time -- with one celebrity unwrapped.

videos.title: Two Masks Take It Off: Holiday Semi-Finals
videos.overview: The remaining masked celebrities compete for a spot in the finals; two celebrities are unwrapped.

videos.title: Road to the Finals
videos.overview: A review of the best performances from Season 2.

videos.title: Season Finale: And the Winner Takes It All and Takes It Off
videos.overview: The three finalists compete for the golden trophy; all contestants are unmasked.

videos.title: The Season Kick off Mask Off: Group A
videos.overview: Television's biggest guessing game returns right after the biggest football game, and superstar Jamie Foxx will be there to play along, as he joins host Nick Cannon and panelists Ken Jeong, Jenny McCarthy, Nicole Scherzinger and Robin Thicke.

videos.title: The Playoffs: Group A
videos.overview: The first group of contestants takes the stage again; actor Jason Biggs joins the panelists.

videos.title: Masking for a Friend: Group A
videos.overview: Group "A" contestants take the stage again and are pared down to the top three of their group.

videos.title: A Brand New Six Pack: Group B Kickoff!
videos.overview: An all-new batch of six celebrities is introduced.

videos.title: Mask-Matics: Group B Playoffs
videos.overview: The singers in group B return to the stage for their "playoff" performances; Gabriel Iglesias.

videos.title: Friends in High Places: Group B Championships
videos.overview: T-Pain joins the panel as a guest judge as group B competes for a spot in the super nine.

videos.title: Last But Not Least: Group C Kickoff!
videos.overview: Six new celebrities take the stage for their first performances of the season.

videos.title: It Never Hurts to Mask: Group C Playoffs
videos.overview: The five remaining celebrities from group C return for their second performances; Joel McHale.

videos.title: Old Friends, New Clues: Group C Championships
videos.overview: Group C members make their final outing on stage and three continue in the competition; Will Arnett.

videos.title: The Super Nine Masked Singer Special: Groups A, B & C
videos.overview: The finalists from all three groups come together for one mega-competition; a singer is unmasked.

videos.title: The Mother of All Final Face Offs, Part 1
videos.overview: Four of the remaining singers pair off to battle on stage; guest panelist Yvette Nicole Brown.

videos.title: The Mother of All Final Face Offs, Part 2
videos.overview: The four remaining singers battle it out; Sharon Osbourne joins the panelists.

videos.title: The Battle of The Sixes: The Final 6
videos.overview: Gordon Ramsay joins the panelists as they dive into the clues; one singer is unmasked.

videos.title: A Quarter Mask Crisis: The Quarter Finals
videos.overview: The final five singers compete in the quarter finals; comic Jeff Dye joins the panelists.

videos.title: A Day In the Mask: The Semi Finals
videos.overview: Jay Pharoah joins the panelists; one singer is unmasked

videos.title: Road to the Finals
videos.overview: Fan-favorite moments and performances from all 18 singers throughout the season.

videos.title: Couldn't Mask For Anything More: The Grand Finale!
videos.overview: The three finalists compete for the golden mask trophy; one-by-one, their identities are revealed, including the winner.

videos.title: The Season Premiere - The Masks Return
videos.overview: A brand-new masked bunch of celebrity singers face off against one another in dazzling costumes.

videos.title: The Group B Premiere - Six More Masks
videos.overview: Meeting the all new celebrity contestants in group B.

videos.title: The Group A Play Offs - Famous Masked Words
videos.overview: Contestants return for the Group A playoffs and their second performances.

videos.title: The Group B Play Offs - Cloudy with a Chance of Clues
videos.overview: The contestants return for the Group B playoffs and their second performances of the season.

videos.title: The Group C Premiere - Masked But Not Least
videos.overview: The final group of celebrity contestants take the stage for their first performances of Season 4.

videos.title: The Group C Play Offs - Funny You Should Mask
videos.overview: The Group C contestants return for their second performance of the season.

videos.title: The Group A Finals - The Masked Frontier
videos.overview: The final three singers from group A take the stage for their final chance at the super six.

videos.title: The Group B Finals - The Mask Chance Saloon
videos.overview: The remaining four singers from Group B compete; two celebrities are unmasked.

videos.title: The Group C Finals - The Masks Give Thanks
videos.overview: The final three singers from group C compete for the final two spots in the super six.

videos.title: The Semi Finals - The Super Six
videos.overview: The finalists from all three groups perform in the semi-finals; three contestants are unmasked.

videos.title: Road to the Finals
videos.overview: A look back at the best moments and performances from Season 4.

videos.title: The Season 4 Finale - Last Mask Standing
videos.overview: The three finalists perform one last time before all are unmasked and one singer wins the trophy.

videos.title: Season 5 Premiere - Return of the Masks
videos.overview: Group A performs as guest host Niecy Nash takes the stage, along with the panelists.

videos.title: Group B Premiere - Shamrock and Roll
videos.overview: Meet the second group of costumed celebrities, Group "B," in another set of all-new jaw-dropping costumes

videos.title: Group A Wildcard Round - Enter The Wildcards!
videos.overview: The highly anticipated, first-ever Wildcard character enters the competition, when the members of Group "A" return to the stage for their second performances of the season.

videos.title: Group B Wildcard Round - Rule of Claw!
videos.overview: The members of Group B return for their second performances of the season.

videos.title: Group B Finals - The Ulti 'Mutt' Wildcard!
videos.overview: The remaining singers battle it out for their spot in the final eight; an unmasking.

videos.title: Group A Finals - In the Nick of Time!
videos.overview: One celebrity is unmasked from Group A; another wildcard enters the competition.

videos.title: Super 8 - The Plot Chickens!
videos.overview: The top four singers from both Group A and Group B unite for a big sing-off; a double elimination.

videos.title: The Spicy 6 - The Competition Heats Up!
videos.overview: The final six sing for the golden mask trophy; guest panelist Chrissy Metz.

videos.title: The Quarter Finals - Five Fan Favorites
videos.overview: As the competition nears the finish line, the final five singers perform in the quarter-finals to see who will advance to the semi-finals.

videos.title: Semifinals
videos.overview: The final four singers sing their hearts out in the semifinals; Cluedle-Doo finally reveals himself.

videos.title: Finale
videos.overview: All three remaining singers are unmasked, but only one is awarded the Golden Mask Trophy.

videos.title: 2 Night Season Premiere, Part 1: Group A Premiere
videos.overview: The characters in Group A perform, ending with a shocking double elimination.

videos.title: 2 Night Season Premiere, Part 2: Back to School
videos.overview: Group A returns and is joined by two wildcard contestants; an unmasking.

videos.title: Group B Premiere
videos.overview: Group B members make their debut; an unmasking.

videos.title: House Party
videos.overview: The Group A members return, and a new wildcard enters the game.

videos.title: Date Night
videos.overview: The characters from Group B return for their second performances of the season.

videos.title: Time Warp
videos.overview: The Group A celebrities take the stage; another wildcard enters the game.

videos.title: All-Time Countdown
videos.overview: Take a ride through the seasons in a special countdown of the greatest performances in the show's history. Watch never-before-seen, behind-the-scenes footage of the unmasked singers from Season Six, while new hints and clues are dropped for those who have yet to be revealed.

videos.title: Giving Thanks
videos.overview: The singers from Group B return to the stage in a special Thanksgiving-themed episode.

videos.title: Group A Semi-Final
videos.overview: The final four Group A singers compete in the semifinals and two are eliminated.

videos.title: Group B Semi-Final
videos.overview: The final four group B singers compete in the semifinals and two are eliminated.

videos.title: Group A Finale
videos.overview: The final two singers from group A perform solo, and then with celebrity duet partners.

videos.title: Group B Finale
videos.overview: Nicole Scherzinger and Robin Thicke duet with the two "Group B" finalists.

videos.title: 2 Hour Grand Finale Part 1
videos.overview: The final two singers perform and both are unmasked; one singer is awarded the Golden Mask Trophy.

videos.title: 2 Hour Grand Finale Part 2
videos.overview: The final two singers perform and both are unmasked; one singer is awarded the Golden Mask Trophy.

videos.title: Masks Back - The Good, The Bad & The Cuddly - Round 1
videos.overview: Five celebrities, representing the three categories of good, bad and cuddly, perform.

videos.title: Masks at Dawn - Round 1
videos.overview: The remaining four singers from Group A return to the stage for their second performances.

videos.title: The Double Unmasking - Round 1 Finals
videos.overview: Group A returns for one final time when the three finalists perform; two singers are unmasked.

videos.title: Masking For It - The Good, The Bad & The Cuddly - Round 2
videos.overview: Five celebrities perform, kicking off round two of the battle to make it to the season finale.

videos.title: Masking for a Duel - Round 2
videos.overview: The good, the bad, and the cuddly continue to battle in round two.

videos.title: The Double Mask Off - Round 2 Finals
videos.overview: The three remaining singers from round two compete for their spot in the finale.

videos.title: Don't Mask, Don't Tell - The Good, The Bad & The Cuddly - Round 3
videos.overview: A brand-new group of five singers is introduced in the third and final round of the season.

videos.title: The Mask of Least Resistance - Round 3
videos.overview: The four remaining singers from round three compete; one singer is unmasked.

videos.title: One Mask Hurrah - Round 3 Finals
videos.overview: The final three singers perform for the last remaining coveted spot this season; two unmaskings.

videos.title: Road to the Finals
videos.overview: A look back at the best moments and performances from Season 7.

videos.title: Season Finale: I'm Team Good, Thanks for Masking
videos.overview: The winner from each of the three final rounds compete head-to-head in the Season 7 finale.

videos.title: A Royal Season Premiere
videos.overview: Four celebrities perform, with only one contestant moving on to the next week.

videos.title: Vegas Night
videos.overview: Blue Man Group, jugglers and more visit the show to welcome two new celebrity singers.

videos.title: TV Theme Night
videos.overview: Two new celebrity singers must perform iconic theme songs from TV shows throughout history.

videos.title: Andrew Lloyd Webber Night
videos.overview: Three new celebrities sing songs from Andrew Lloyd Webber's legendary music catalog.

videos.title: Muppets Night
videos.overview: Miss Piggy serves as a guest panelist; appearances by Kermit the Frog, Animal and Fozzie Bear.

videos.title: 90s Night
videos.overview: Two new characters enter the competition; the studio audience votes for one singer to be unmasked.

videos.title: Hall of Fame Night
videos.overview: Three new characters enter the competition and two are unmasked; Leslie Jordan; Joel McHale.

videos.title: Comedy Roast Night
videos.overview: The panelists roast one another as two new characters enter the competition; Drew Carey; Jon Lovitz.

videos.title: Fright Night
videos.overview: Two new contestants enter the competition, and two are unmasked.

videos.title: Battle of the Semi Finals
videos.overview: One contestant is eliminated and the remaining two advance to the finals.

videos.title: Two Hour Epic Finale Pt. 1
videos.overview: The best moments of Season 8.

videos.title: Two Hour Epic Finale Pt. 2
videos.overview: Both finalists sing their hearts out one last time, with only one taking home the trophy.

videos.title: Season 9 Premiere
videos.overview: Three celebrities perform.

videos.title: ABBA Night
videos.overview: Two new characters enter the competition; two are unmasked.

videos.title: New York Night
videos.overview: Contestants sing a collection of songs synonymous with the history of New York.

videos.title: DC Superheroes Night
videos.overview: Three new singers enter the game and celebrate their favorite iconic DC superheroes in costume.

videos.title: Sesame Street Night
videos.overview: Two singers are unmasked.

videos.title: Country Night
videos.overview: Three celebrities perform their favorite country songs; two are unmasked.

videos.title: '80s Night
videos.overview: Two singers are unmasked; one advances to the quarterfinals.

videos.title: WB Movie Night
videos.overview: Costumed celebrities perform iconic songs from hit Warner Bros. films.

videos.title: Masked Singer in Space
videos.overview: Two singers are unmasked; one goes to the quarterfinals.

videos.title: Supreme Six
videos.overview: A recap of the journeys of the three remaining champions and the three remaining underdogs.

videos.title: Battle of the Saved
videos.overview: Mantis, Gargoyle and Medusa compete for their spot in the quarterfinals.

videos.title: Quarter Finals
videos.overview: The final four compete for a spot in the semifinals, performing British Invasion-themed songs.

videos.title: Semi-Finals
videos.overview: The remaining three celebrity singers perform, but only two move on to compete in the season finale.

videos.title: Finale
videos.overview: The final two contestants each perform two songs; one celebrity is crowned the Season 9 winner.

videos.title: Season 10 Premiere
videos.overview: Five celebrities perform and one is unmasked.

videos.title: NFL Night
videos.overview: Celebrating the NFL with songs that have been performed at the Super Bowl; Le'Veon Bell performs.

videos.title: 2000s Night
videos.overview: Five celebrities perform songs from the 2000s and one is unmasked.

videos.title: A Celebration of Elton John
videos.overview: Celebrating the music of Elton John.

videos.title: Harry Potter Night
videos.overview: A special Harry Potter-themed episode; former contestant Adrienne Bailon-Houghton performs.

videos.title: One Hit Wonders Night
videos.overview: Four new celebrities sing songs that were once all the rage; an unmasking.

videos.title: Trolls Night
videos.overview: The stars of "Trolls Band Together," Poppy and Branch, take the stage for a special performance.

videos.title: Disco Night
videos.overview: Celebrating the Disco era, including a special performance by The Trammps; Group A returns.

videos.title: I Wanna Rock
videos.overview: The show celebrates rock 'n' roll as the group B finalists rock out to legendary songs.

videos.title: Soundtrack to My Life
videos.overview: The group C finalists perform songs representing key moments in their lives.

videos.title: Season 10 Finale
videos.overview: The contestants perform new songs in the season finale episode before the audience and panel votes.

videos.title: Season 11 Premiere: Rita We Love Your Ora
videos.overview: The season premiere kicks off with an exciting performance by new panelist Rita Ora.

videos.title: Group B Premiere: The Wizard of Oz Night
videos.overview: Four new celebrities sing their hearts out and celebrate iconic moments from "The Wizard of Oz."

videos.title: Group C Premiere: Billy Joel Night
videos.overview: The celebrity singers belt out classic tunes from the iconic Bill Joel.

videos.title: TV Theme Night
videos.overview: Contestants celebrate by performing iconic TV theme songs.

videos.title: Group C Finals: Shower Anthems Night
videos.overview: The contestants perform iconic songs that are best sung at full volume in the shower.

videos.title: Transformers Night
videos.overview: Celebrating the 40th anniversary of Transformers, with special guests Optimus Prime and Bumblebee.

videos.title: Group A Finals: Queen Night
videos.overview: Two celebrities break free of their masks and one moves on to the quarter finals.

videos.title: Girl Group Night
videos.overview: Panelists open the show with a group performance of the Spice Girls anthem "Wannabe."

videos.title: Group B Finals: Soundtrack Of My Life
videos.overview: Contestants perform songs that hold a special place in their hearts; two celebrities are unmasked.

videos.title: Quarter Finals: Final Four
videos.overview: The final four contestants perform; one celebrity is unmasked, leaving the final three to move on.

videos.title: Road To The Semi-Finals
videos.overview: Reliving the season's most exciting highlights as well as special performances from the final three.

videos.title: Semi-Finals: Then There Were Three
videos.overview: The three remaining contestants battle it out for the final two spots.

videos.title: Finale: One Mask Takes It All
videos.overview: The final two celebrities deliver exceptional performances before the winner is revealed.

videos.title: Season 12 Premiere: Who Can it Be Now?
videos.overview: Celebrity performances from five all-new masked celebrities and a jaw-dropping reveal.

videos.title: Footloose Night
videos.overview: Celebrating the 40th anniversary of the iconic film "Footloose."

videos.title: Group A Finals: Soundtrack of My Life
videos.overview: The three Group A finalists open the special night with a superstar performance of "High Hopes" by Panic! At The Disco, followed by sensational renditions of songs near and dear to the contestants.

videos.title: Group B Premiere: Sports Night
videos.overview: Five new contestants make their debut with songs like "Rock Your Body," "Believe" and "We Belong."

videos.title: Barbie Night
videos.overview: The Group B celebrities pay tribute to the 65th anniversary of Mattel's Barbie.

videos.title: Group B Finals: '60s Night
videos.overview: Group B finalists compete to secure a spot in the quarter-finals; celebrities pay tribute to '60s.

videos.title: Group C Premiere: Who Are You Fest
videos.overview: Group C performs "You and I," "Under the Bridge," "Tonight Tonight," "Call Me Maybe" and "Slow Burn."

videos.title: Miley Cyrus Night
videos.overview: The celebrities pay homage to some of Miley Cyrus' songs.

videos.title: Group C Finals: A Peanuts Thanksgiving
videos.overview: Celebrating the beloved Peanuts gang; the celebrities give Thanksgiving-themed clues and perform hits like "I Hope You Dance," "Holiday" and "Ho Hey," culminating in a Battle Royale and Double Elimination.

videos.title: Quarter Finals: Merging of the Masks
videos.overview: The group champions are all together to battle it out and share some pivotal clues.

videos.title: Semi-Finals: The Final Three
videos.overview: The top three battle it out for the last two spots; the semi-finalists perform "Some Nights."

videos.title: Finale: A Champion Is Crowned
videos.overview: Nick Lachey performs; the final two compete and the winner is crowned.

videos.title: Lucky Season 13: Group A Premiere
videos.overview: Contestants from Group A perform hits like "SexyBack," "Just Give Me a Reason," "The Door," "La Bamba" and "Mad World."

videos.title: Shrek Night
videos.overview: Group A channels their inner fairytale by performing songs from or inspired by the "Shrek" movie franchise.

videos.title: Group A Finals: A Rat Pack Tribute Night
videos.overview: Group A swoons, sings and serenades the audience with some of the Rat Pack's most iconic classics.

videos.title: Group B Premiere: Voices of Olympus
videos.overview: Five new masks appear as the Voices of Olympus; contestants perform showstopping renditions of "I Believe In a Thing Called Love," "Bad Blood," "Rewrite the Stars," "Espresso" and "Saving All My Love For You."

videos.title: Ghostbusters Night
videos.overview: Group B performs for the judges; special guest Ernie Hudson.

videos.title: Group B Finals
videos.overview: The Group B finalists perform "Save a Horse (Ride a Cowboy), and renditions of "Here You Come Again," "Take Me Home, Country Roads" and "Something in the Water."

videos.title: Group C Premiere: Carnival Night
videos.overview: The celebrities deliver astounding performances of "Hot to Go," "Jump Around," "Roxanne," "Let's Get Loud" and "Unwell."

videos.title: Boy Band Night
videos.overview: Paying tribute to boy bands; contestants perform iconic boy band classics like "Tearin' Up My Heart," "Poison," "Step By Step" and "I Swear."

videos.title: Group C Finals: Decades Night
videos.overview: Each celebrity performs a hit from an iconic era.

videos.title: The Lucky 6: Merging of the Masks
videos.overview: The final six celebrities are ready to battle it out to get one step closer to the elusive Golden Mask Trophy; the panelists have an opportunity to ask some rapid-fire questions to each masked contestant.

videos.title: Quarter Finals: Soundtrack Of My Life Night
videos.overview: The final five perform "Sk8er Boi," "Million Reasons," "Golden Hour," "Your Love" and "The Scientist"; one celebrity must reveal themselves while the rest advance to the semifinals.

videos.title: The Semi-Finals: Head-To-Head Battles
videos.overview: The four semifinalists battle it out ahead of next week's blockbuster season finale; an unmasking.

videos.title: The Two-Hour Lucky Season 13 Finale
videos.overview: The final masked celebrities bring the house down with renditions of "Black Horse and the Cherry Tree," "Moon River," "Freedom! '90," "Stay" and more, while the panelists use the biggest clues yet to make their final guesses for a chance to win.
